Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Merge all test worktrees and consolidate tests

Consolidated test files from test-phase1, test-phase2, and test-phase3 worktrees:
- Unit tests \(5 files\) from test-phase1
- Integration tests \(5 files\) from test-phase2
- E2E tests \(1 file\) from test-phase3
- Merged conftest.py with best fixtures from all phases
- Added pytest.ini configuration
- Created complete test directory structure
- Added .claude/ to .gitignore

All test phase branches removed and worktrees cleaned up.

EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive test suite documentation to README

- Document 81 tests with 96% coverage
- Add testing section with pytest commands
- Include test organization structure
- Add coverage reporting instructions
- Update .gitignore for test artifacts \(.coverage, htmlcov/, .pytest_cache/, .trees/\)
